title: Santa Fe Trail
creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures, Jack L. Warner and Michael Curtiz
brief_description: A saga on the American civil war starring Errol Flynn, Olivia de Havilland and Ronald Reagan. Flynn plays Jeb Stuart, a military man who travels in pursuit of John Brown, leader of a violent anti-slavery campaign. Reagan plays George Custer, romantic rival and West Point classmate of Flynn’s. It is an action packed but ambiguous portrayal of the American civil war and its protagonists who held intensively opposing views.
